summary:
RaceMenu preset??? No way! No one has ever done it before! Wow, I'm so original.

Though it may appear to be interesting for someone idk.
descriptionHtml:
[center]
[img]http://ymail.flamingtext.com/ymail/2017/01/31/flamingtext_com_1485851278_20044145.png[/img][/center][font=Arial][i][size=4]Sorry, too lazy to make description look admirable.                           Be sure to read the 'Requirements' section
[img]https://pp.userapi.com/c638429/v638429245/1b3a6/ueOj8bQIxpA.jpg[/img]
[img]https://pp.userapi.com/c638429/v638429245/1b3ba/g-vtoTQ-Msc.jpg[/img]
[/size][/i][/font][img]https://pp.userapi.com/c638429/v638429245/1b3e2/Q0SkwlowZoQ.jpg[/img]
[size=3]ENB used for screenshots:[/size]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/61968/?]Elder Blood ENB Redux[/url][size=3] with [/size][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/70451/?]Snapdragon[/url][size=3] DoF[/size]
[img]http://ymail.flamingtext.com/ymail/2017/01/31/flamingtext_com_1485851922_20044148.png[/img]
[size=3]There are several options: Temptress/Nord race with HDT/non-HDT hair. Simply drop the 'Data' folder from one of the archives in the download section to your Skyrim directory. Nothing complicated.[/size]
[img]http://ymail.flamingtext.com/ymail/2017/01/31/flamingtext_com_1485851823_20044147.png[/img]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29624/?]RaceMenu[/url] and it's requirements by [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/2950481]expired6978[/url] (Strong Requirement)

[color=#ff0000]Body and head textures[/color] from [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/38326/?]Seranaholic[/url] (or any other mod by [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/2650523]rxkx22[/url]). Open the 'Seranaholic' archive, than go to Seranaholic 1.7 -> 00 Main -> Textures -> actors -> character -> Serana and copy all .dds files to your Data/textures/temptress (optional)/actors/character/female folder. You may also install 4k texture patch from the 'Optional' section of Seranaholic mod page. This is the most complicated step, though, technically, it's skippable.

[color=#ff0000]Makeup[/color] from [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51602/?]Fair Skin Complexion[/url] by [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/4557236]HHaleyy[/url] or [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35267/?]SG Female Texture Renewal[/url] by [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/2209393]hellosanta[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/4557236]
[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/79622/?]The Witcher 3 Eyes[/url] by [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/2235573]Oaristys
[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68311/?]KS Hairdos[/url] by [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/4559665]Kalilies[/url] or [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/70363/?]KS Hairdos HDT[/url] by [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/1251063]Stealthic Khaos[/url] (depending on the option you choose)

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52841/?]Freckle Mania[/url] by [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/981329]tetrodoxin
[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/18717/?]Temptress Race[/url] by [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/1255344]Psychos1s[/url] (optional)

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50302/?]Better Females Eyebrows - Standalone[/url] by [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/4559665]Kalilies[/url] (don't need this if you chose Temptess Race option)

[color=#1e84cc][size=3][i]Thus in your game she will look exactly like she does in mine.[/i][/size][/color]
[size=3]
Those were also the credits[/size]
[size=3]
[/size][size=4][url=http://eiheispot1.blog.fc2.com/blog-entry-538.html]
[img]http://ymail.flamingtext.com/ymail/2017/01/31/flamingtext_com_1485852058_20044150.png[/img]

[center][/center][/url][/size][font=Verdana][color=#00ffff][size=3][img]https://pp.userapi.com/c638429/v638429245/1b3ce/_i6FCHk_VFk.jpg[/img]




Special thanks for Opeth and Meshuggah for creating albums Orchid and The Violent Sleep of Reason, because I was listening to them while writing the description)))))[/size][/color][/font][img]http://www.progarchives.com/progressive_rock_discography_covers/1122/cover_33433952016_r.jpg[/img][img]http://cdn.bloody-disgusting.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/08/meshuggahtheviolentsleepcover.jpg[/img]
Do I have to mention this is my first mod?
author: Wasyash
